welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Valley Center, a charming city known for its beautiful natural landscapes and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. We hope you have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mc Clellan-Palomar Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Mc Clellan-Palomar Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Thermal Airport serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Thermal Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing exclusive services and facilities for VIP passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gillespie Field Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Gillespie Field Airport is used for private and charter flights, as well as flight training and aircraft maintenance services.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal and in select areas on the airfield.
